original_title: Court refrains from issuing an arrest warrant against Diana Gamage
original_body_lines: The Colombo Chief Magistrate’s Court today refrained from issuing an arrest warrant against State Minister Diana Gamage for allegedly committing offences under Immigrants and Emigrants Act.

Colombo Chief Magistrate Prasanna Alwis observed that the court would not issue an order in terms of section 32 of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act since prosecution has not concluded investigations into the incident.

A group of lawyers led by President's Counsel Rienzie Arseculeratne and Udara Muhandiramge appearing for the complainant sought an order for the arrest of State Minister Diana Gamage for committing offences under Immigrants and Emigrants Act.(Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
